nodes.text: During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the Hutt crime lord Suudaa Nem'ro controlled a gang that operated on the planet Nal Hutta. It was led by Rex Geer in Nem'ro's stead, and was involved in battles against Fa'athra's forces during the ongoing rivalry between Nem'ro and Voontara Fa'athra.
Higher-ranking members of the gang wore blue-grey armor as uniforms. Lower-ranking members wore white and dark brown armor as uniforms.
